New Records: The White Sox are on pace to lose 124 games and potentially break the 1962 Mets' record for most losses in a single MLB season
Key Match Events: Lenyn Sosa got hit in the face with a ball before the top of the eighth
Andrew Vaughn was robbed of what would have been a walk-off home run in the bottom of the ninth by Travis Jankowski's leaping catch
Post-Match Reflections: The 2024 season has been historically bad for the White Sox
Miscellaneous Highlights: Travis Jankowski made an unreal catch to rob a homer
